name: Urban Night Battle Girl
description:
This is a casual game that combines beauty + elimination + plot. In a bustling city, you and the heroine, who have always been low-key, seem to fall into the abyss of love after encountering the heroine. In the heroine's eyes, you are her savior, a person who can be entrusted for life. Man, but how it ends is entirely up to you!
◆The explosive elimination gameplay will make your hand unable to stop.
◆Exquisite original character design.
◆ Attractive animation effects make you want to keep fighting.
◆Abundant storylines make you think elegantly, and the multiple ending choices make you unexpected.

With the development of the plot in the game, you will attack the boss by eliminating the game, and get gold coins, defeat the boss and enter the next chapter, if you fail, you need to continue to challenge the boss of this chapter. The gold coins obtained can be used to purchase items, gems and other equipment in the store. After purchase, you need to equip them to increase your attack or defense to defeat the boss. In the development of the plot, choose different things, and there will be different endings after customs clearance.
